mapper.insert: insert into sys_user (user_id, user_name, password, real_name, salt, email, mobile, status, dept_name, create_time, create_by, update_time, update_by) values (#{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{realName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{salt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{deptName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update sys_user set user_name = #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, real_name = #{realName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, salt = #{salt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, mobile = #{mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status = #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT}, dept_name = #{deptName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, create_by = #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_by = #{updateBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select user_id, user_name, password, real_name, salt, email, mobile, status, dept_name, create_time, create_by, update_time, update_by from sys_user where user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
select user_id, user_name, password, real_name, salt, email, mobile, status, dept_name, create_time, create_by, update_time, update_by from sys_user

select user_id, user_name, password, real_name, salt, email, mobile, status, dept_name, create_time, create_by, update_time, update_by from sys_user where user_name = #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select user_id, user_name, password, real_name, salt, email, mobile, status, dept_name, create_time, create_by, update_time, update_by from sys_user where user_name = #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
